name: no-pkg-config
short_description: no-pkg-config is a bash script that implements the functionality of the standard pkg-config utility. It is intended for users of minimal systems, who want to use pkg-config but do not want to install all the dependencies of the standard implementation. Most of the important features of the original implementation are supported. The command-line syntax and .pc file format are identical to the original.
summary: A bash script that implements the functionality of pkg-config
